name: refactor-udagram-app-into-microservices
description: Udagram is a simple cloud application developed alongside the Udacity Cloud Engineering Nanodegree. It allows users to register and log into a web client, post photos to the feed, and process photos using an image filtering microservice.

scripts.apply:deployment: kubectl apply -f udacity-c3-deployment/k8s/backend-feed-deployment.yaml && kubectl apply -f udacity-c3-deployment/k8s/backend-user-deployment.yaml && kubectl apply -f udacity-c3-deployment/k8s/frontend-deployment.yaml && kubectl apply -f udacity-c3-deployment/k8s/reverseproxy-deployment.yaml
